item.title: JavaScript: How to detect online status in browser
item.description: Sometimes we need to check whether the user is online. In today’s world, more than billion people are online, but not everyone has a better internet connection; so there is a nice feature in modern browsers that we can cache the data in the browser’s local storage so next time the user visits, there is no need to download the data again. The browsers provide navigator property that will help us to find the online status of the user.
